Class.name: PApplet
Class.Desc: Represents an interactive animation that runs in the Pygame window and is modelled on Processingâ€™s PApplet class. Sketch and Environment are subclasses which extend PApplet.

Method.name: PApplet(setup, draw, eventMap)
Method.Desc: The constructor creates a PApplet instance. Use the run method to run the sketch.
Method.Arg: An unbound function that initializes the sketch. A reference to the sketch.
An unbound function that draws one frame of the animation. A reference to the sketch.

Class.Method: Set the sketch background. An image to be used for the sketch background. The sketch aspect ratio will be locked (except when maximized) to match the background image. A color to be drawn as the background. If both arguments are given, the image will be blitted onto a background of the specified color.

Run the sketch. The initial size of the sketch in pixels. A string specifying the caption for the sketch window. The path to an image to be used as the window icon. Change to 0 to make the sketch non-resizable.

PropR.name: frameCount
PropR.Desc: The total number of frames that have been drawn (including the current frame).

PropR.name: draw
PropR.Desc: A reference to the current drawing function.

PropR.name: eventMap
PropR.Desc: A dictionary that maps event types (keys) to handler functions (values). Use the animate method to change the event map.
